fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Offer a player a contract during the day. (3 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
Redirect, Control, Conversion, and Roleblock immunity.
- You will be notified when your target has decided on their contract, but not what they chose.

fields.name: The Contract:
fields.value: - If you accept the contract, you must see the Seven win, you will replace your current wincondition with this.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Devolve the town into sin and chaos.
